findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead and increases unnecessarily the gas consumption.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not adhere to the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that can cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code makes a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, increasing the size of the contract and deployment costs.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local scope variable shadowing can lead to confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables without proper checks for zero values, leading to potential problems during execution.
